title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Language-Based Profiling to Understand Emotional Impacts in Anatomy Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Emotional responses occurring during anatomy practical sessions can be analyzed with over 80% accuracy

Learners can write a 500+ character essay detailing three or more specific emotional changes (e.g., frustration, accomplishment, curiosity) experienced during AI practice and submit a report meeting at least four of five rubric criteria evaluating emotional articulation (structure, coherence, specificity).

Learners can collaborate with three peers to complete a 2-week AI-based emotion analysis project (e.g., BERT, GPT) and submit a final report and demo video meeting peer evaluation rubric standards (emotion recognition accuracy ≥70%, collaboration participation ≥4/5 points).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
